alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 05 at 12:11PM EDT until April 05 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 125 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN BLACKFORD DE KALB GRANT HUNTINGTON JAY LAGRANGE MIAMI NOBLE STEUBEN WABASH WELLS WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN BRANCH HILLSDALE IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, AUBURN, BERNE, BLUFFTON, BLUFFTON, BRONSON, BRYAN, COLDWATER, COLUMBIA CITY, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, DECATUR, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, DUNKIRK, EDGERTON, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GAS CITY, GRISSOM AFD, HARTFORD CITY, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, HUNTINGTON, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, LAGRANGE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIGONIER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MARION, MEXICO, MONTPELIER, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NEW HAVEN, NORTH MANCHESTER, OHIO CITY, OSSIAN, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAYNE, PERU, PORTLAND, ROANOKE, SHERWOOD, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH WHITLEY, SPENCERVILLE, SWANTON, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, UPLAND, VAN WERT, WABASH, AND WAUSEON.
